column2: Traffic;Phnom Penh: A woman------ were injured after an RX300 hit the tuk tuk they were traveling in and------ failed to stop
column3: but left crucial evidence at the scene.------The traffic accident ------occurred at 1:20 am on ------Thursday October 4

column7: Phnom Penh.------According to a local source ------
